dea.spamRescue
Class SpamInfo

java.lang.Object
  dea.spamRescue.SpamInfo
public class SpamInfo
extends Object

A class for holding information about the email currently being processed.
Rev 1.7 Mark emails with spamarrest's line (Precedence: auto_reply) as bounce so the will be ignored since their bounce does not contain any headers. Rev 1.6 Store x-envelope-to to bcc instead of to so we can check it for spam traps.
Rev 1.5 add cc.
Rev 1.4 add code to hold and parse headers.
Rev 1.3 add bounce host stuff.
Rev 1.2 add orginal text field.
Rev 1.1 add virus info field.

Author:
David Abigt
